title: From Manual Labor to Precision Tech
title_pt: Do trabalho manual à tecnologia de precisão
text: Feed formulation strategy. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. Telemetry from precision agriculture guides irrigation decisions. Maintenance avoids breakdowns during harvest.
